name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Ronald Francis PUKSAR, Appellant

judges: BEFORE: CASTILLE (C.J.), SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, TODD, MCCAFFERY, ORIE MELVIN, JJ.
Justice ORIE MELVIN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Ronald Francis PUKSAR, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of February, 2013, the order of the Court of Common Pleas is AFFIRMED.
Justice ORIE MELVIN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Renee Hurtig Edelman, Federal Community Defender Office, James H.. Moreno, Defender Ass’n of Philadelphia, for Appellant.
Melissa Joy Noyes, Berks County Dist. Atty’s Office, Amy Zapp, PA Office of Atty. Gen., for Appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
64 A.3d 1057
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Ronald Francis PUKSAR, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Dec. 24, 2012.
Decided Feb. 19, 2013.
Renee Hurtig Edelman, Federal Community Defender Office, James H.. Moreno, Defender Ass’n of Philadelphia, for Appellant.
Melissa Joy Noyes, Berks County Dist. Atty’s Office, Amy Zapp, PA Office of Atty. Gen., for Appellee.
BEFORE: CASTILLE (C.J.), SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, TODD, MCCAFFERY, ORIE MELVIN, JJ.
